REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0836 reute r f BC-OXFORD-ENERGY-<OEN>-T 03-31 0053

TEXT.TITLE: OXFORD ENERGY <OEN> TO OFFER SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Oxford Energy Co said it expects to file later today for an offering of 1,200,000 common shares through underwriters led by Bear Stearns Cos Inc <BSC>. The company said proceeds will be used for waste tire incineration projects and other corporate purposes. Reuter
